Slab Hooker.comment: Disable this if you dont want slab hooker. (wont disable the additional lines on the double slab)

Additional Line for Double Slab.comment: Disable this if you dont want additional lines on the double slab.

Enable Half-Mining.comment: Enable this if you want that tools can half-mine the full slab.

Slab Hooker In Creative.comment: Enable this if you want to use slab hooker only in survival mode.
